headline: Assessing NuScale Power’s Valuation After Policy Support And Duke Energy Interest In Its SMR Design
summary: NuScale Power (SMR) is back in focus after a sharp move in its share price, with investors reacting to supportive U.S. nuclear policy, its NRC approved small modular reactor design, and Duke Energy’s recent plant filing. See our latest analysis for NuScale Power. The latest 15.1% one day share price gain to $16.31 sits against a weaker backdrop, with a 30 day share price return of a 23.75% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of a 31.07% decline, suggesting short term momentum has...
